channel.title: Colony 42?
channel.description:
Just been bowsing the web trying to find out if this is still in development?
Been playing alot of Half Life lately and was looking for a decent Mod...
I've checked the developers web page and other half life sites but thought the trusty BM crew might know

item.title: Colony 42?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
baconeggs:

(Quote from VDC)

Hm. Yes. It was more or less the first thing I did once I figured out how to compile a map with basic entities. As a result it was total crap. So I scrapped it, and decided to start again later. It’s much, much better now. It’s no Black Mesa, but it’s much better than it was.

ronaldtaylor:

I realize that there is a single color of light, and this helps, but I think my excuse is that some of the most effective use of fading light. Do not worry, the last chapter two will not have much white light, it will be many varieties of color.

What? That’s not what I said at all. And it’s been addressed.

Also, Mapping for Goldsource again is as painfully slow as stabbing someone to death with a rubber knife.

Read full topic

item.title: Colony 42?
item.dc:creator: ronaldtaylor
item.description:
I realize that there is a single color of light, and this helps, but I think my excuse is that some of the most effective use of fading light. Do not worry, the last chapter two will not have much white light, it will be many varieties of color.

Read full topic

item.title: Colony 42?
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
Colony 42 is the latest incarnation of JeffMOD’s Science-fiction modification, and by far the most developed. The original, known as USS Black Mesa, was scrapped because JeffMOD could not, at the time, understand how to make HL change levels properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Colony 42?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Great. Now I feel EXTRA obligated to finish it.
And I’ll feel bad if anyone’s disappointed.
8|
[COLOR=‘Black’]And it doesn’t help that I’m not only the project lead, but the project team.[/SIZE]

Read full topic

item.title: Colony 42?
item.dc:creator: FFFUUU
item.description:
Looking forward to it Jeff

Read full topic

item.title: Colony 42?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Whoops. Didn’t see this until I got your PM. I’ve replied to it, so check your User CP.

As for anyone else wondering, the mod’s current status at this time is Limbo; I have other, more time-constrained projects to work on, and my little goldsource mod has been shoved aside for a while.

Read full topic

item.title: Colony 42?
item.dc:creator: FFFUUU
item.description:
JeffMOD is a member of the development team for Colony 42 and he’s registered in this forum. PM him about it.

Read full topic
